featured.text: “My weight dropped to 48.3 from 54.4 kilograms, and my classmates won’t be able to call me ‘porker’ anymore,” Chang said happily.

definition.zh_def: 豬，特別是指肥豬或用於肉類生產的豬。
definition.en_def: A pig, especially one that is raised for meat production.
definition.example: The farmer decided to sell his best porker at the market.
